ygData.subject: unFinished Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: Howdy All In my travels I hear grumbling from rouges unable to find any traps to disarm while peddling mechanical lockpicks. Bards wishing they could make
ygData.messageBody:
Howdy All

In my travels I hear grumbling from rouges unable to find
any traps to disarm while peddling mechanical lockpicks.
Bards wishing they could make their own instruments.
(neither apparently implemented)

Many merchants across Norrath sell unfinished horns,
lute strings, mouth pieces etc...

Then I pondered on how organized the tinkering community
has always been. Research into Gimblestan's puzzling
notes as seen at Fulcrum's Compendium.

Could our Workbox be useful for other than tinkering?
For those who have bard friends, I know there is no trade
skill like fletching or jewelry that is unique to them.
Singing, blowing horns, pounding on drums and strumming of course.

BizzleBob [Veeshan]
